content.query:
CREATE VIEW FranceView AS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dlintech001.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Bank_Churn/geography=France/date_of_processing=2025-12-04/part-00000-4216d405-cce1-42a2-9f9a-ad91def8ab5b.c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
